scripts.test: cross-env HOTRELOAD=no DEBUG=bpmn-engine:123* mocha "./dist/*.roxtest.js" --exit js:babel-register --recursive --timeout 4000000 --require regenerator-runtime
scripts.copyproduction: cross-var copyfiles package.json production && cd ./production && npm install --production && cd .. && cross-var copyfiles -u 1 production/node_modules/** $npm_package_servicename && rimraf production/
scripts.copyfiles: cross-var copyfiles service.json dist/* $npm_package_servicename && npm run copyproduction
scripts.copyandzip: cross-var npm run copyfiles && npm run zip && cross-var rimraf $npm_package_servicename
